t: Classic Patterns for the Fine Gauge CinDwood Looms: Royale, Scarlett: 9781519201409: Amazon.com: Books
s: This is a pattern book created for the CinDwood first fine gauge looms, the 56 peg 1/4" and 40 peg 3/8" gauge. All patterns accept the toe socks are written for both looms. I used Red Heart Boutique Unforgetable, Red Heart Cutie Pie, Lions Brand Heartland, Lions Brand Landscape yarns for this book.
